long_description: The Keen Barkley Slip-On shoes have a comfortable fit and stylish look that transitions easily from day to night. Nubuck leather uppers; full-grain leather padded collars. Microfiber lining wicks moisture away from your feet to keep them dry. Dual stretchy gores make the shoes easy to slip on and off. Patented Toe Guards protect feet and leather from bumps and abrasion. Removable EVA molded footbeds. Nonmarking thermoplastic urethane/rubber outsoles on the Keen Barkley Slip-On shoes provide great traction on varied surfaces.
short_description: The Keen Barkley Slip-On shoes have a comfortable fit and stylish look that transitions easily from day to night.
